price: Nuko tumurokorana na Lutwi (Loti) tubajyana mu gihugu (cya Shami)[1] twashyiriyemo ibiremwa byose imigisha.
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [1] Shami: Ni akarere ko mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, kari kagizwe n’ibihugu by’ubu bya Yorudaniya, Libani, Siriya na Palesitina.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
